name: Not Scary, Didn't Scare
description: I am a 12 year old kid who decided to make a game and this is what happened. it might not be scary to most people but i made it because it is my type of horror style. it is inspired by an old indie game titled "EVIL". you can probably find it on some dead website somewhere. this game was made with 0 budget so you can expect it to be low quality. basically you are just a psychopath child and go to school to find that everything is wrong. the game isnt taken very seriously though as there are many memes and jokes and other things. hence the title "Not Scary, Didn't Scare".  try to get all 4 endings, they're the only big part of the game.
